scripts.build: run-p build:* buildvendor:* && npm run hash-assets
scripts.buildcss:pubs_base: node-sass --include-path node_modules/uswds/src/stylesheets styles/pubswh/pubs_base.scss dist/pubs_base.css && uglifycss --output dist/pubs_base.css dist/pubs_base.css && postcss dist/pubs_base.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o dist/pubs_base.css
scripts.buildcss:auth: node-sass --include-path node_modules/uswds/src/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/stylesheets styles/auth.scss  dist/auth.css && uglifycss --output dist/auth.css dist/auth.css && postcss dist/auth.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o dist/auth.css
scripts.buildcss:manager: node-sass --include-path node_modules/uswds/src/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/backgrid/src --include-path node_modules/backgrid-paginator --include-path node_modules/jquery-ui-dist --include-path node_modules/tinymce/skins/lightgray --include-path node_modules/eonasdan-bootstrap-datetimepicker/src/sass --include-path node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/stylesheets styles/manager/manager_custom.scss dist/manager.css && uglifycss --output dist/manager.css dist/manager.css && postcss dist/manager.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o dist/manager.css
scripts.buildcss:metrics: node-sass --include-path node_modules/uswds/src/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/dygraphs/dist --include-path node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/stylesheets styles/metrics/metrics_custom.scss dist/metrics.css && uglifycss --output dist/metrics.css dist/metrics.css && postcss dist/metrics.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o dist/metrics.css
scripts.build:fonts: mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp node_modules/uswds/src/fonts/* dist/fonts && cp node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/* dist/fonts && cp node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/fonts/bootstrap/* dist/fonts && cp node_modules/tinymce/skins/lightgray/fonts/* dist/fonts
scripts.build:images: mkdir -p dist/images && mkdir -p dist/img && cp -r node_modules/uswds/src/img/* dist/img && cp -r images/* dist/images
scripts.test: karma start tests/js/manager/karma.conf.js && karma start tests/js/metrics/karma.conf.js && karma start tests/js/pubswh/karma.conf.js
